title: Customized E-Learning Design and Short-Intensive Language Learning Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Learning Experience and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Applying customized e-learning solutions designed according to individual language proficiency and learning styles. Conducted in a BYOD environment, maximizing learning outcomes through LMS-based activities, individualized feedback, and summative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners understand e-learning design principles (e.g., integration of objectives, assessments, methods, and media) and can apply them to actual language learning content
Learners can establish and execute personalized language learning plans using customized e-learning tools
Learners improve practical communication skills (reading/writing) in target languages (e.g., English) through interactive activities provided in LMS
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
